Changes.LogName: 8 Hearts Event Part 2: Romantic This Time

kindadumbautumn/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Harvey 64 18 0/pause 1000/speak Harvey "$query TIME 1200 #Hi, @.|Good morning, @."/pause 50/speak Harvey "Sorry to stop by without warning, but I was wondering if, uh..."/pause 50/$quickQuestion Would you like to meet me at the Stardrop Saloon later?#Sure!#Not today...(break)friendship Harvey 20\speak Harvey "Great!$h#$b#I'll meet you there sometime after 6PM, alright?"(break)friendship Harvey -2\speak Harvey "Ah. Fair enough, I'm sure you're very busy.#$b#I'm there most rainy nights, if you're ever free."/pause 50/speak Harvey "See you later, @."/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/end

entries.HarveyPlus.8Date2/e HarveyPlus.8Date1/p: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Shane 21 17 2 Leah 2 20 1 Pam 7 18 1 Willy 17 22 2 Sam 38 18 0 Gus 10 18 2 Emily 16 17 0 Harvey 18 20 0/skippable/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/advancedMove Emily true -3 0 4 5000 3 0 4 3000 -2 0 4 3000 -2 0 4 1000 4 0 4 4000/viewport 14 16/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 23/textAboveHead Gus "Welcome in!"/move farmer 0 -3 0/move Gus 3 0 1/textAboveHead Gus "Just a moment."/move Gus 5 0 2/playSound pickUpItem/speak Gus "Here's your coffee, Dr. Harvey."/pause 50/speak Harvey "Thanks, Gus."/pause 100/move Gus -4 0 2/speak Gus "Alright. What can I get for you, @?"/quickQuestion #A beer.#Coffee.#Green tea.(break)speak Gus "You got it! I'll be right back.$h"\move Gus -4 0 0\move Gus 0 -1 0\friendship Harvey -5\pause 100\speak Harvey "It's been a long day, huh?"\faceDirection farmer 1(break)speak Gus "You got it! I'll be right back.$h"\move Gus -4 0 0\move Gus 0 -1 0\friendship Harvey 20\pause 100\speak Harvey "I'd say it's a little late in the day for caffeine, but they do say people in glass houses shouldn't throw stones."\faceDirection farmer 1(break)speak Gus "You got it! I'll be right back.$h"\move Gus -4 0 0\move Gus 0 -1 0\friendship Harvey 10\pause 100\speak Harvey "It certainly is a "hot drinks" kind of day, isn't it?"\faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/speak Harvey "I don't come here often, but sometimes on days like this it's nice to have coffee I didn't make myself."/pause 5000/end
